org.icij.datashare.text.extraction

Interface FileParser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileParser, TikaFileParser

    public interface FileParser
extends Serializable
    Extract text and metadata from files Created by julien on 3/9/16.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static Optional<FileParser> create(FileParser.Type type,
                                   Properties properties)
        Instantiate a concrete FileParser reflectively with a FileParser.Type enum value
        Parameters:
        type - the FileParser.Type enum value denoting a FileParser implementation
        properties - the FileParser settings as Properties
        Returns:
        the corresponding FileParser implementation instance if succeeded; empty Optional otherwise
        See Also:
        FileParser.Type, EnumTypeToken, FileParser.Property

      • create

        Instantiate a concrete FileParser of DEFAULT_TYPE
        Returns:
        the corresponding FileParser implementation instance if succeeded; empty Optional otherwise

        EnumTypeToken

      • parse

        Optional<Document> parse(Path filePath)
        Parses the file located at filePath
        Returns:
        an optional of Document if succeeded; an empty optional otherwise
